about_the_game:
HD Soundtrack by Keo R. Bun.

Hello explorer, and welcome to RogueStone! Get ready for a long voyage full of magic, intrigue, and peril. We have creatures like dragons and giants whose distinct tones and atmosphere will send goosebumps down your spine.

However, there's still more! We at RogueStone have produced an incredible musical experience with a dynamic soundtrack that perfectly encapsulates the narrative, characters, and setting. You'll think you're actually playing the game thanks to the realistic and expressive sounds our composer produced using Yamaha XG and SoundCanvas, the most potent and adaptable sound engines.

Our rich and layered soundscapes of strings, woodwinds, brass, percussion, and electronic sounds match the game's action and mood perfectly. You'll feel like you're battling dragons or exploring ruins in another world! Yamaha XG and SoundCanvas are the ultimate tools in video game music. Our stunning soundtrack adds depth and excitement to the game that you don't want to miss. So, what are you waiting for? Start exploring the wondrous universe of RogueStone today and feel the power of our amazing soundtrack for yourself!

*Click on 'View the website', to listen to Previews of the audio track on Youtube today.

name: RogueStone Soundtrack
short_description: HD Soundtrack by Keo R. Bun. Two of the most potent and adaptable sound engines ever put on the market—the Yamaha XG and SoundCanvas—have been employed to produce the highest level of audio clarity and depth. From orchestral instruments to synthesizers and beyond..
